orders.name: iPhone 14 Pro
orders.description: iPhone 14 Pro features a 6.1-inch Super Retina XDR OLED display, A16 Bionic chip, 48MP main camera, Dynamic Island, ProMotion technology, and all-day battery life. Available in various colors with storage options up to 1TB.

orders.name: Samsung Galaxy S23
orders.description: Samsung Galaxy S23 features a 6.6-inch Dynamic AMOLED display, Snapdragon 8 Gen 2 processor, triple camera system with 50MP main sensor, 5G connectivity, and long-lasting battery with fast charging capabilities. Available in multiple sophisticated colors.

orders.name: Google Pixel 7
orders.description: Google Pixel 7 features a 6.3-inch OLED display, Google Tensor G2 chip, advanced dual camera system with 50MP main sensor, enhanced AI capabilities, clean Android experience, and all-day battery life. Known for its exceptional photography capabilities.

orders.name: OnePlus 11
orders.description: OnePlus 11 features a 6.7-inch QHD+ AMOLED display with 120Hz refresh rate, Snapdragon 8 Gen 2 processor, Hasselblad triple camera system, 100W fast charging, and OxygenOS for smooth performance. Delivers flagship experience with premium build quality.
